card.name: Anateo
card.property: Outlaw. Each time you assign Anateo, if there is at least one complication, you may block a character from the current mission.

card.name: Ardent Prior
card.property: While Ardent Prior is assigned, each ready character with a glyph matching a glyph beneath an assigned character is blocked. Failure: you may move one glyph from one team character to another.

card.name: Bynarr
card.property: While Bynarr is ready or assigned, he gets: "After each time your opponent plays an event, but before it resolves, you may destroy Bynarr. If you do, that event has no effect."

card.name: Cer'nak
card.property: Cer'nak costs power -1 to play for each assigned team character. Failure: Your opponent discards two cards at random.

card.name: Crystalline Entity
card.property: Each time you assign Crystalline Entity, you may pay 1 power. if you do, block a character from the current mission. While Crystalline Entity is assigned, each assigned character who shares a glyph with the blocked character gets skills -1.

card.name: De'vir
card.property: Outlaw. When you score De'vir, destroy a gear or a gear card attached to a character. Failure: Take a Jaffa obstacle or a gear in your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Emissary Varta
card.property: Each time you assign Emissary Varta, if a support character was destroyed during the current mission, you may stop a character.

card.name: Jayem Seran
card.property: To assign Jayem Seran, you must pay X power, where X is equal to a number of your choice between 0 and 2. Each time you assign Jayem Seran, he gets difficulty +X and revive cost +X until the end of the current mission, and your opponent loses X+1 power.

card.name: Lourdes Malay
card.property: While Lourdes Malay is assigned, each team character who has one or more attachments gets skills -1. (Attachments are cards that are placed beneath or on another, like glyphs or obstacles.)

card.name: Ministrant Prior
card.property: While this adversary card is in your villain score pile, Ori adversaries cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Poole's Replicator
card.property: While Poole's Replicator is assigned, Replicator obstacles cost power -1 to play for each complication at the current mission.

card.name: Ryan Williams
card.property: Failure: For each failed mission this turn (including the current mission), destroy a gear. This may target gear cards that are attached to characters or ships.

card.name: Solek
card.property: Outlaw. Destroy Solek, pay 3 power - Destroy a support character. This ability costs power -1 to activate for each complication at the current mission.

card.name: Teresh
card.property: Outlaw. While Teresh is assigned, your opponent must pay 1 power to use an activated ability or a triggered effect on their gears or ships.

card.name: "Todd"
card.property: Stop "Todd", reveal a Wraith card or an obstacle card in your hand, drain X (X is the revealed card's cost) - You may play the revealed card at no cost.

card.name: "Trebal"
card.property: Your opponent's cards consider that "Trebal" does not have the Wraith trait. Failure: You may play a Wraith ship at no cost.

card.name: Vashin
card.property: Outlaw. Destroy Vashin, pay 1 power - Choose one effect that will last until the end of the current mission, where X is equal to the number of complications: Choose an adversary to get difficulty +X; or choose a villain ship to get firepower +X.

card.name: Wraith Scientist
card.property: When you score Wraith Scientist, you may take a Disease or Wraith obstacle card from your discard pile into hand. If that obstacle has dominion, you may pay 2 power. if you do, place it in your villain score pile instead of your hand.

card.name: Abrabam Ellis
card.property: Each time you play a mission, you may stop and destroy Abraham Ellis and pay 4 power. If you do, that mission becomes a Combat mission.

card.name: Alexi Vaselov
card.property: When you assign Alexi Vaselov, at the end of the current mission, destroy him unless you pay 2 power. While Alexi Vaselov is assigned, he gets: "Destroy Alexi Vaselov - Return an assigned adversary to their owner's hand."

card.name: Antonius
card.property: Stop and destroy Antonius - Unblock each team character.

card.name: Ava Dixon
card.property: While there is at least one Replicator card at the current mission, Ava Dixon gets skills +X, where X is equal to half the number of Replicator cards at the current mission (rounded up).

card.name: Bill Lee
card.property: Each time you play a mission, you may stop and destroy Bill Lee and pay 4 power. If you do, that mission becomes a Science mission.

card.name: Fischer
card.property: Disease obstacles cost power -1 to play. During your opponent's turn, Fischer becomes an adversary. He can't be assigned, revived, or scored. At the end of that turn, destroy Fischer.

card.name: Ian Davidson
card.property: Victory: You may pay 2 power and discard a card. If you do, destroy an assigned villain ship or an assigned adversary.

card.name: Inago
card.property: While a gear has been played this turn, lnago gets Culture +1, Science +1, and Combat +1.

card.name: Jacek
card.property: Each time you assign Jacek, you may drain 1. If you do and the drained card is a hero card, Jacek gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission. Pay 1 power - Look at the top card of your deck. You may place it on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Merlin
card.property: When you play Merlin, stop him. Stop and destroy Merlin - Destroy all obstacles at the current mission.

card.name: Meurik
card.property: When you play Meurik, you may stop him and pay 2 power. If you do, turn a Culture obstacle at the current mission face down (it becomes a complication).

card.name: Miller
card.property: Success: You may pay 1 power. If you do, ready a hero ship.

card.name: Nak'ryl
card.property: Stop and destroy Nak'ryl - Choose another Jaffa character to get skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Paul Carpenter
card.property: Discard a card, choose a non-Political obstacle at the current mission - The chosen obstacle gets the Political trait in addition to its other traits. Draw a card.

card.name: Redden
card.property: Each time you assign Redden, you may discard a card. If you do, Disease obstacles cost power +1 to play until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Ren'al
card.property: When you play Ren'al, you may destroy a prepared ambush obstacle. Success: You may discard a hero card. If you do, choose a hero card in your discard pile whose cost is lower than the discarded card, and take it into hand.

card.name: Reya Varrick
card.property: When you play Reya Varrick, you may stop her and pay 2 power. If you do, turn a Science obstacle at the current mission face down (it becomes a complication).

card.name: Se'tak
card.property: Each time you assign Se'tak, you may pay 2 power and destroy an assigned non-Jaffa support character. If you do, destroy an assigned adversary.

card.name: Thilana
card.property: When you play Thilana, you may stop her and pay 2 power. If you do, turn an Ingenuity obstacle at the current mission face down (it becomes a complication).

card.name: Valencia
card.property: When you play Valencia, you may stop her and pay 2 power. If you do, turn a Combat obstacle at the current mission face down (it becomes a complication).

card.name: Aldwin
card.property: Orion or Pisces: Each time you assign Aldwin, choose a number and reveal it. Then, your opponent reveals a random card from their hand for each glyph Aldwin has. For each revealed card whose cost matches the chosen number, gain 1 power.

card.name: Bates
card.property: Scorpius or Triangulum: Each time you assign Bates, you may take into hand a gear card in your discard pile whose cost is lower than or equal to twice the number of glyphs he has.

card.name: Bo'rel
card.property: Each time Bo'rel earns a glyph, you may choose one: Destroy a villain ship; or take a ship card in your opponent's discard pile and place it beneath Bo'rel. Gemini or Triangulum: Bo'rel gets Combat +1 for each ship card beneath him.

card.name: Bra'tac
card.property: Libra: Each other character who has a glyph matching one of Bra'tac's gets Ingenuity +1. Orion: Each other character who has a glyph matching one of Bra'tac's gets Combat +1. Scorpius: Each other character who has a glyph matching one of Bra'tac's gets Culture +1.

card.name: Chloe Armstrong
card.property: Triangulum Stop Chloe Armstrong - Support characters cost power -1 to play until the end of the turn. You can do this only once each turn. Triangulum and Triangulum: While Chloe Armstrong is assigned, she gets skills +1 for each other assigned team character.

card.name: Joel Brecker
card.property: Libra or Orion: Each time your opponent plays a villain card with a printed cost of 4 or more, you gain 1 power. Orion and Pisces: Villain cards with a printed cost of 2 or less cost power +1 to play.

card.name: Laura Cadman
card.property: Gemini and Orion: Each time you use an ability on a gear whose activation cost includes destroying itself, you may stop Laura Cadman and pay 2 power. If you do, that ability's effect is resolved twice (you may choose different targets).

card.name: Lindsey Novak
card.property: Gemini or Scorpius: While Lindsey Novak is assigned with a hero ship, you get total firepower +1 for each glyph she has during that mission's ship battle. Gemini and Scorpius: At the start of your turn, after you have stopped the hero ships that were previously incapacitated, you may ready one of them.

card.name: Matthew Scott
card.property: Matthew Scott's abilities cost power -1 to activate when they target a Destiny character or a support character. Libra or Triangulum, Pay 2 power - Ready another assigned character. You can do this only once each turn. Libra and Triangulum, Pay 4 power - Ready another stopped character. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Paul Davis
card.property: Gemini or Triangulum: Paul Davis gets Culture +1 and Ingenuity +1 while there is at least one Political card at the current mission. Gemini and Triangulum: Each time a Political card is destroyed, gain 1 power.

card.name: Reimer
card.property: Scorpius or Triangulum, Pay 2 power - Ready Reimer. Incapacitate him at the end of this turn. You can do this only once each turn. Pisces and Scorpius: You may use Reimer's first ability one additional time each turn. The first use each turn costs power -1 to activate.

card.name: Ta'seem
card.property: Each time you assign Ta'seem, adversaries get revive cost +1 for each different glyph he has until the end of the current mission. Libra or Orion: Ta'seem gets Science +1. Goa'uld adversaries cost power +1 to play. Libra and Orion: To assign an adversary, your opponent must drain 1 for each different glyph Ta'seem has.

card.name: Thor
card.property: Gemini: Asgard gears and Asgard ships cost power -1 to play. Pisces: Asgard events cost power -1 to play. Scorpius: Asgard support characters cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Zarin
card.property: Each time you assign Zarin, for each different glyph she has, your opponent must discard a random card face down (they may look at them), then for each of them, they either turn it face up, or pays 1 power to take it back into hand. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Backup
card.property: To play this event, stop a team character. Ready up to two support characters.

card.name: Bad Guys
card.property: Stop each assigned support character. Until the end of the current mission, support characters are blocked and each team character gets skills +1.

card.name: Brief Reunion
card.property: Choose a support character in your discard pile whose cost is 4 or less and play them from there at no cost. At the end of the current mission, destroy the chosen character.

card.name: Close Quarter Combat
card.property: Ready each assigned ship. All ships are blocked until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Full Retreat
card.property: Ready each assigned character. The next mission this turn costs power +1 to play and gets difficulty +1.

card.name: In Pursuit
card.property: This event costs power +1 to play for each assigned adversary. Stop each assigned adversary. All adversaries are blocked until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Morgan Le Fay's Tests
card.property: To play this event, you must pay X power. Look at the top X cards of your mission pile. Place those cards in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Mystery Destination
card.property: Search you mission pile for two missions with different skill requirements, reveal them, and set them aside. Shuffle your mission pile. Your opponent chooses one of the revealed missions to be put on the top of your mission pile. Put the other on the bottom of that pile.

card.name: Sharing Experience
card.property: To play this event, discard a card and choose two assigned team characters who share an affiliation trait. Raise the lowest contributed skill's rating among the chosen characters to become equal to that of the other.

card.name: Ancient Transporter
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 1 power - Look at the top card of your mission pile. You may place that card on the bottom of that pile.

card.name: AT4 Rocket Launcher
card.property: Stop and destroy this gear, pay 3 power - Destroy an obstacle at the current mission or an assigned villain ship.

card.name: Destiny's Bridge
card.property: Stop this gear, block a team character from the current mission - Choose a hero ship to get firepower +X until the end of the current mission, where X is equal to the blocked character's Ingenuity.

card.name: The Sword in the Stone
card.property: Stop this gear - The current mission gets difficulty +1 and: "Success: Place this gear beneath an assigned team character." While this gear is beneath a character, they get experience +1.

card.name: Teleporter Armband
card.property: When you play this gear, place one charge counter on it. Place this gear on a character - That character gets: "Destroy a charge counter on this gear, pay 1 power - Ready this character" and "Stop this character - Place a charge counter on this gear." You can use each of these abilities only once each turn.

card.name: Virtual Reality Stasis Pod
card.property: When you play this gear, your opponent chooses an adversary card in his villain score pile. Place it beneath this gear. When this gear is destroyed, place the adversary card beneath it in your opponent's villain score pile.

card.name: Anti-Rebel Task Force
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. They are blocked. Failure: Your opponent chooses a glyph beneath the chosen character and puts it on the bottom of their mission pile.

card.name: Asuran Ascendancy
card.property: Failure: Destroy each gear in play and each gear card attached to a character or a ship. Instead of placing them in their discard pile, your opponent shuffles the destroyed gear cards into their deck.

card.name: Battle Formation
card.property: Dominion. While this obstacle card is in your villain score pile, it gets cost +1.

card.name: Beacon of Enlightenment
card.property: Ori obstacles cost power -1 to play while an Ori adversary is assigned. Adversaries get revive cost -2 but can't be scored.

card.name: Blind Devotion
card.property: When you play this obstacle, ready an assigned character with 3 Culture or more. They are blocked. Failure: Stop the chosen character.

card.name: Celestis's Bulwark
card.property: When you play this obstacle, prepare this ambush. While this ambush obstacle is prepared, each time an adversary would be destroyed, you may destroy this obstacle. If you do, they become stopped instead. Ambush (Science/Combat): You may pay 1 power. If you do, prepare this ambush.

card.name: Chokehold
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. They are blocked. Failure: Incapacitate the chosen team character.

card.name: Cliffhanger
card.property: You can do nothing but pass until the end of the current mission. Failure: Your opponent can't play any more missions this turn.

card.name: Close Protection
card.property: Support characters are blocked.

card.name: Conversion
card.property: To play this obstacle, you must choose an assigned support character. When you play this obstacle, place it on the chosen character and ready them. They become an adversary under your control, with no game text, the Ori trait, and a revive cost equal to their cost. They can't be scored.

card.name: Crippled
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned team character. They get skills -1 for each attachment they have. (Attachments are cards that are placed beneath or on another, like glyphs or some obstacles.) Failure: Incapacitate the chosen character.

card.name: Crusade
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may take an Ori obstacle or an Ori ship card from your discard pile into hand. Failure: You may take this obstacle into hand.

card.name: Distracted
card.property: When you play this obstacle, ready an assigned character with 3 Ingenuity or more. They are blocked. Failure: Stop the chosen character.

card.name: Doomsday Scenario
card.property: Failure: If you control a Replicator adversary, you may blockade a mission beneath them.

card.name: Grisly Discovery
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may purge up to two character cards from your opponent's discard pile.

card.name: Ground Assault
card.property: Dominion. At the beginning of this mission's ship battle, stop each assigned ship.

card.name: Hijacked Ship
card.property: Outlaw. When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned hero ship to get firepower -1 for each complication. Victory: Place this obstacle on an incapacitated hero ship and stop it (it's no longer incapacitated). It becomes a villain ship under your control, with no game text.

card.name: Iratus Bug Nest
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Science/Ingenuity): Until the end of the current mission, each time you play a Wraith obstacle, you may draw a card.

card.name: Kel Shak Lo
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a Jaffa adversary is assigned. Failure: Destroy a support character. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Culture/Combat): Jaffa adversaries get difficulty +1 and revive cost -1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Pinned Down
card.property: Dominion. Withdraw 1. Failure: Each assigned adversary gets revive cost -1 (or -2 if they are Wraith).

card.name: Plans Within Plans
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent draws 4 cards. Failure: Your opponent must drain 4, or drain 8 if a Wraith adversary is assigned.

card.name: Plot Twist
card.property: When you play this obstacle, each ongoing effect from hero cards that would last "until the end of the current mission" or "until the end of the turn" ends immediately.

card.name: The Price of Disloyalty
card.property: This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each other Jaffa card at the current mission.

card.name: Prowling Hunters
card.property: Dominion. This obstacle gets Science +2, Ingenuity +2, and withdraw 2 while a Wraith adversary is assigned.

card.name: Recurring Nightmares
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may stop a character with a Disease obstacle on them. Failure: Place this obstacle on a character.

card.name: Ripple Effect
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. Until the end of the current mission, other team characters lose all their skill ratings, traits and game texts, and get those of the chosen character.

card.name: Scorching Judgment
card.property: When you play this obstacle, destroy an assigned support character.

card.name: Thwarted Plans
card.property: To play this obstacle, you must stop an adversary. When you play this obstacle, ready each assigned adversary. Adversaries are blocked.

card.name: Traitor's Reward
card.property: Outlaw. To play this obstacle, destroy an adversary. When you play this obstacle, gain power equal to the destroyed adversary's highest difficulty rating.

card.name: Unsanctioned Research
card.property: When you play this obstacle, for each other Replicator card at the current mission, you may play a complication at no cost.

card.name: Vagonbrei Parasite
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on an assigned character. They get: "Each time this character becomes stopped, place a sleep counter on them. Each time this character would become ready, if they have one or more sleep counters, destroy these counters instead" and "Success: Destroy this obstacle."

card.name: Vile Proposal
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent may stop two characters. If they don't, stop a character.
